com.orientechnologies.security.auditing

Class OAuditingHook

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orientechnologies.orient.core.hook.ORecordHookAbstract
      • com.orientechnologies.security.auditing.OAuditingHook
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ODatabaseListener, ORecordHook

    public class OAuditingHook
extends ORecordHookAbstract
implements ODatabaseListener
    Hook to audit database access.
    Author:
    Luca Garulli
